content:
The Fontainebleau Miami Beach is an iconic resort!

The Fontainebleau Miami Beach has its own loyalty program called **Fontainebleau Rewards**. As a member, you can earn points and rewards when you stay at the resort, dine at their restaurants, or indulge in their spa treatments.

Here are some benefits you can expect as a Fontainebleau Rewards member:

* **Points Earning:** Earn points for every eligible stay, dining purchase, or spa treatment at the Fontainebleau Miami Beach.
* **Room Upgrades:** As a loyalty member, you might be eligible for room upgrades, subject to availability.
* **Early Check-in/Late Check-out:** Fontainebleau Rewards members may be able to check-in early or check-out late, depending on the resort's availability.
* **Exclusive Offers:** Members receive access to exclusive promotions, discounts, and packages throughout the year.
* **Priority Reservations:** Loyalty members get priority reservations at the resort's restaurants, bars, and spa facilities.
* **Special Perks:** Depending on your tier level, you might receive additional perks like complimentary Wi-Fi, bottled water, or even a welcome amenity.

To join Fontainebleau Rewards, you can sign up on their website or inquire about it during your stay.

Additionally, the Fontainebleau Miami Beach sometimes offers special packages and promotions for loyalty members, so be sure to check their website or contact their loyalty program team for more information.

I hope this helps, and I'm sure you'll have a fantastic time at the Fontainebleau Miami Beach!
